captions.text: This week’s Music Monday will give you food poisoning,
and if you are lucky
we might just give you the new B.A.P's CD and poster
for our wonderful subscribers who we love so much,
with the B.A.P.’s Power.
So let me start off music monday by saying that
I lost my voice over the weekend due to laryngitis,
so Simon is going to be dubbing over my voice with his voice
HA LOST MY VOICE
HOOO RIPITO FIPITO SIPI SLOW MOTION.
Thank you Simon for being so accurate with your dubbing.
I knew I could trust you with this kind of power.
By the way, TOP is very smelly.
OMG He's so smelly
I don't like him whatsoever
What a dumb guy
TOP,
you smell (Martina : What? No..I... )
I don't like you whatsoever. (Martina : I'm gonna kill you )
Now, I didn't instantly love this song as much as I loved Warrior,
but that doesn't mean I don't like this song.
This is still totally kickass rocking song.
I’m not even sure I can call them singers in this song,
because it seems more like growling and yelling.
As for the video, they’re not smiling and winking and flirting
and trying to get you to fall in love with them.
They don’t care about seducing you.
They’re confident,
and aggressive,
and indifferent,
and we really like that about them
We’re happy that they're sticking with a very powerful
and aggressive image and not wiffle waffling.
(Simon)Martina wiffle waffling is not a word
Yes it is
They debuted as rugged and badass,
and they’re sticking that way.
Good, because
really
if they ever try to pull of a cute and playful Bilasa kind of video,
I think I might vomit.
I don’t think it’s possible for Bang Yong Gook to be cute.

See how angry he always looks?  
00:01:42.20lip
Give him a bunny
and he’ll eat it before he pets it.
I’d suggest maybe he take a nap
or something to sleep off the crankies,
but it seems like,
even after a long cryogenic nap
as he travels through hyperspace,
Bang Yong Gook wakes up just as grumpy as ever.
That's okay Bang Yong Gook
I don't want you the other way
(Simon) That sounds wrong coming out of my mouth.
How do they have that much energy after they woke up?
Shouldn't they be a bit more groggy?
And maybe a little bit clammy in the mouth?
Who the hell wakes up and starts rapping instantly?
*alarm sounds*
7am, hopped out of bed
Gotta be fresh before my day begins
I should use SOAP!
I'll guess I use this SOAP!
ARGH!!!
I TAKE A SHOWERR!!   WHOA!
FOR HALF AN HOUR!!! WHOA!
But today I don't have the time
NO NO, so I'll just stick to this
A COLONGE SHOWERR!!
I STILL SMELL SOWERR!!
*coughing*
Weirdest dance ever.
Not saying that in a bad way.
We loved it.
It was totally original,
even if it was both bizarre
and exceptionally impractical
to spray yourself with that much cologne.
I feel like i'm back in high school
walking down that one hallway of cologne doom.
em
eh
meow
But...they’re not spraying themselves...
so it can’t be cologne.
What is it, then?
It’s not spray paint either,
because they’re not painting on anything
unless they broke into the Doradora set to practice?
Ah that explains the couch
My best guess: they’re outside at night,
spraying away from themselves
it’s gotta be mosquito spray.
Freaking mosquitos.
I’m surprised they’re so composed, though.
When I’m getting attacked by mosquitos,
I’m more like
Or, if it’s not mosquitos,
the only other answer, in my mind...
is not as glamorous.
Whooh
That did not digest well
*dancing*
You know it’s really bad
if you gotta get all of your friends to help you spray away the stink.
Oooh!
B.A.P.
you so nasty!
But you can’t really blame them
it’s quite common for you to get the poops
if you travel to another country and eat their food.
Imagine going to another planet!
I’m guessing
they went for Taco Bell.
That’s a recipe for disaster.
Delicious
Delicious
Disaster
This, in fact,
might explain the change from Face Arousal Raunchy Thrusting
and lip rubbing to covering their mouths altogether.
It looks like they’re about to throw up.
See that green bubbling sludge?
I’ll let you guess what they’re smelling.
woooh.. You so nasty
wooh... You so nasty
woooh
woooh...You so nasty
Last week we asked you who you’d prefer as housemates
U-Kiss’ twisty room in Doradora,
or MBLAQ’s Emo Gas Station in Mona Lisa,
and the winner was,
by only 100 votes,
MMMMBLAQ.
I guess you can say,
people prefer the scent of gas to neon paint.
For this week’s Showdown
we ask you which really original dance you prefer
B.A.P.’s fart spray dance in POWER,
or 2PM's puppet string dance in Heartbeat.
Leave your votes in the comments,
or in our Facebook poll,
and we’ll announce the winners next week.
Also thanks  for all the F.A.Pers
who requested voted for B.A.P this week
And let us know who you want us to do for next week’s Music Monday.
Taetiseo’s got a really big lead over everyone
on the K-POP Charts right now so for.
Can they hold out for another week
and get reviewed for next week,
or will someone come by and dethrone the princesses?
Make your vote count in the only place that counts by voting
head on over tot http://www.eatyourkimchi.com/kpopcharts/.
and get voting.
Also, next Music Monday
might be a Music Tuesday
because we are heading over to Malaysia for the weekend
but we will try to get this done as soon as possible
we promise
We are not gonna skip it like last week with EXO
because we know that you will gonna murder us
with knives
and anger
Now, we don’t usually do giveaways two weeks in a row,
but we are totally amazed at how many votes for B.A.P
It's like,
the most voted video ever.
It beats second place
two times over.
So, to thank you for all of your awesome diligence,
we are going to give away  B.A.P. Power CD to one person
and the poster to another.
Best answer for our contest gets first pick!
For our YouTube subscribers,
make sure that you subscribed us by
clicking on the link here.
Then, all you gotta do is tell us in the comments
below what you think B.A.P. are spraying.
We gave you our answers
You give me yours
It’s that easy!
For our Facebook fans,
when you see the contest thread,
like the post first,
and then answer the same question.
Answer only in the contest thread!
Not on our wall.
If you post on on our wall instead,
and I’ll summon a hoard of Dothraki Warriors to slitter your village.
We’ll announce the winners in our next week’s Music Monday.
And  for the winners of the U-Kiss contest,
we are going to announcing them at the blooper reel,
so check it out over there
And, lastly,
don’t forget to give this video a like and a favorite,
because we like you so much and because we’ve give you awesome CDs
and to subscribe for more Music Mondays.
Take it away, Spudgy!
